welcome:
Welcome to AxiiomaticOS
Type 'help' to see a list of available commands
Type 'sumfetch' to display summary
Type 'quit' to exit the CLI
invalidCommand: '{command}' is not recognized as a valid command
aboutResponse:
Hello! I'm {name}, but I usually go by {aka} online
I'm a {age} year old {occupation} at {company} located at {location}
I'm interested in {career_interests}
However, I also really enjoy {personal_interests}!
More about me:
'sumfetch' - Short Summary
'resume' - My Latest Resume
'readme' - My Github README
aboutAka: I almost never use my real name online. I usually go by {aka} in social media
aboutInterests:
I'm interested in {career_interests}
I also enjoy {personal_interests}!
aboutMe:
Hello! I'm {name}.
I'm a {occupation}. Nice to meet you!
speedErrorNaN: Typing speed must be an integer
speedErrorOutOfRange: Typing speed must be a positive integer between 1 and 100
speedErrorAlready: Typing speed is already set to {speed}
themeErrorNA: That theme is not available. Available themes: {themes}
curlErrorNoURL: Please provide a URL to fetch data from
currencyErrorNegative: Invalid amount. Please provide a positive number.
guiAbout: Hello! I'm {first_name}, though you'll often find me online as {aka}.
guiMore: I've been passionate about computers and programming since childhood, which has led me to my current career as a {occupation}.
guiSelf: A lot of my coding knowledge has been self taught over the last {years} years. I have a big interest for {interests}.
